title: Game asking me to Patch - Patch stuck ETA 0 MINS 0.0mb/0.0mb
body: My patcher is currently stuck, I was playing a game and after my game was over it asked me to restart the client so that it may patch. However, the game is not patching.

replies.body:
It looks like we're still having some patching issues and working on a definite fix for everyone, but in the meantime try updating a couple network settings to see if we can get you a better link with those patching servers and get you back on the rift. 

Update your port forwarding and DNS server settings following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if that is able to help at all.
